com.kontakt.sdk.android.http.interfaces

Interface DevicesApiAccessor

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IKontaktApiClient
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    KontaktApiClient

    public interface DevicesApiAccessor
    Devices API accessor provides interface describing interaction with API and Devices management.

      • getDeviceByProximity

        HttpResult<IDevice> getDeviceByProximity(java.util.UUID proximityUUID,
                                         int major,
                                         int minor,
                                         SDKOptional<ETag> eTag)
                                  throws ClientException
        Requests beacon by proximity sending ETag in newHeader additionally. If the ETag's value matches the latest one the code 304 (NOT MODIFIED) is returned.
        Parameters:
        proximityUUID - the proximity uUID
        major - the major
        minor - the minor
        eTag - the eTag
        Returns:
        the beacon by proximity
        Throws:
        ClientException - the client exception

      • listDevices

        HttpResult<java.util.List<IDevice>> listDevices(RequestDescription requestDescription)
                                         throws ClientException
        Provides the list of devices. According to request description the response:
        • may contain sorted list items
        • may contain empty body for conditional requests with ETag value included in headers
        • may contain list items in ascending or descending order
        • may contain ranged list items by specifying start index and offset
        Parameters:
        requestDescription - the request description
        Returns:
        the devices
        Throws:
        ClientException - the client exception

      • listDevices

        ClientException

                                                    throws ClientException
        Requests beacons for managers by provided manager Ids. If the ETag's value matches the latest one the code 304 (NOT MODIFIED) is returned.
        Parameters:
        managerIds - the manager ids
        eTag - the e tag
        Returns:
        the devices for managers
        Throws:
        ClientException - the client exception

      • updateDevice

        int updateDevice(DeviceData deviceData)
          throws ClientException
        Updates device. Required parameter: device unique Id. The optional parameters are: Proxmity UUID, major, minor, password, txPower interval, alias. If any of the optional values is null, it will not be updated.
        Parameters:
        deviceData - the device update data
        Returns:
        the int
        Throws:
        ClientException - is thrown if unexpected error has occured

      • applyConfig

        int applyConfig(IConfig config)
         throws ClientException
        Applies config. Successful config application causes erasing it. This method should be used once the Config is created and to be applied to the device.
        Parameters:
        config - the config
        Returns:
        the Http Status. Successful Config application returns Http Status: 200.
        Throws:
        ClientException - is thrown if unexpected error has occured
